row.process: :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_RA_REST.PRV.INCLUDE.CONNECTION_IS_SET_FROM_PROMPTS :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_RA_REST.PRV.INCLUDE.PUT_ATT_ENDPOINT :PUT_ATT conn_auth_method = "OAuth" :PUT_ATT conn_auth_oauth_version_method = "1.0a" !Authen mode prompt :PUT_ATT conn_auth_oauth_clientkey = &CONN_AUTH_OAUTH_CLIENTKEY# :PUT_ATT conn_auth_oauth_clientsecret = &CONN_AUTH_OAUTH_CLIENTSECRET# :PUT_ATT conn_auth_oauth_token = &CONN_AUTH_OAUTH_TOKEN# :PUT_ATT conn_auth_oauth_signature_type = &CONN_AUTH_OAUTH_SIGNATURE_TYPE# :PUT_ATT conn_auth_oauth_token_secret = &CONN_AUTH_OAUTH_TOKEN_SECRET# :PUT_ATT conn_auth_oauth_verifier = &CONN_AUTH_OAUTH_VERIFIER# :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_RA_REST.PRV.INCLUDE.PUT_ATT_PROXY :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_RA_REST.PRV.INCLUDE.PUT_ATT_ADVANCE
